Text: ENJOY Chasing Madoff 2010 DVDRIP New a movie to enjoy this night by WIDE!

A: 10 V: 9. M: 4  This isn't a movie...but it's not a documentary either. It fails at both. You'll understand my comment after you watch this movie...sorry, I mean documentary. 

If the Academy Awards had an Oscar for the "Biggest Douche Bag on film," Harry Markopolos would have run away with it.
